summary: Stage A3 gate shakeout remained in sandbox mode because hardware packaging prerequisites (python -m build wheel support, docker, pytest-cov instrumentation) are unavailable and the sandbox cannot reach gate-runner-02.

notes: Alpha gate shakeout requires the hardware builder image with docker-in-docker enabled; the sandbox forbids docker daemon access.
Coverage publishing depends on pytest-cov and FFmpeg/SoX hooks to mirror the hardware telemetry, all of which remain unavailable here.
